title: Mastering Guitar
description: A comprehensive course on mastering the guitar, covering techniques, scales, and popular songs.

title: Piano for Beginners
description: Learn the basics of playing the piano, including reading sheet music and playing simple songs.

title: Advanced Violin Techniques
description: A deep dive into advanced violin techniques for experienced players.

title: Drumming Essentials
description: Learn essential drumming techniques and rhythms, perfect for beginners and intermediate players.

title: Jazz Saxophone
description: Explore the world of jazz saxophone with lessons on improvisation, scales, and classic jazz pieces.
